attributes.action: Revoke the independence of the United States of America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of US failure to elect a competent President and thus to govern themselves we feel that the British Crown should reclaim ownership of the USA for the safety of the world.Whilst we are at it, we should also teach them English and diplomacy.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
